articles.title: Supreme Court opens door to social media age-gating in US
articles.description: The Supreme Court will let Mississippi’s social media age verification law take effect while the case is being argued in court. In an unsigned ruling on Thursday, the court declined to block the law after an emergency petition from trade association NetChoice.
